buildCommand: cd ClientApp && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='src/assets/appsettings.json';const e=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));const u={SDMS_B2CWebApp_url:process.env.SDMS_B2CWebApp_url||e.SDMS_B2CWebApp_url,SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_url:process.env.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_url||e.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_url,SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_clientid:process.env.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_clientid||e.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_clientid,SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_redirectUri:process.env.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_redirectUri||e.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_redirectUri,SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_scope:process.env.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_scope||e.SDMS_AuthenticationWebApp_scope};fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(u,null,2));" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='src/environments/environment.ts';let c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');c=c.replace(/production: false/,'production: true');fs.writeFileSync(p,c,'utf8');" && npm run build:prod
installCommand: cd ClientApp && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
